original_text: with a passage in front of them. They were similar to the chambers on the north, of the same length and breadth, with the same exits and arrangements and doors,
korean_text: 그 두 방 사이에 길이 있고 그 방들의 모양은 북쪽 방 같고 그 길이와 너비도 같으며 그 출입구와 문도 그와 같으며

sentences.original_text: with a passage in front of them.
They were similar to the chambers on the north,
of the same length and breadth,
with the same exits and arrangements and doors,
